de.affect.mood

Class Mood

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.mood.Mood

  • public class Mood
extends java.lang.Object
    The Mood class represents mood of a character. Mood is represented as a triple of different mood characteristics, associated to the PAD-Model of Affect: pleasure, arousal, and domiance
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mood(double pleasure, double arousal, double dominance)
      Constructs a new Mood object with the specified values for each mood dimension in the PAD mood space

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mood

        public Mood(double pleasure,
    double arousal,
    double dominance)
        Constructs a new Mood object with the specified values for each mood dimension in the PAD mood space
        Parameters:
        pleasure - the degree of pleasure
        arousal - the degree of arousal
        dominance - the degree of dominance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the degree is not a real number in the interval [-1.0,1.0].
